title: 'Selma' Manages To Be Both Passion-Inspiring And Measured
teaser: Critic Bob Mondello reviews Selma, Ava DuVernay's film chronicling Martin Luther King Jr.'s historic voting-rights march in 1965. Mondello notes that recent protests make the film resonate today.
